title: The owner shall be eligible for the commencement certificate for the incentive BUA only after rehabilitation of occupants of affected tolerated structure /removal of structures falling in the alignment of road line/DP Road
clause_text: The owner shall be eligible for the commencement certificate for the incentive BUA only after rehabilitation of occupants of affected tolerated structure /removal of structures falling in the alignment of road line/DP Road.
section: Removal and re-accommodation of tolerated /protected structures falling in the alignment of road: -
